plugin.name: schema_validator
plugin.description: a plugin for validating yang files

plugin.name: yangtree_generator
plugin.description: a plugin for generating yang tree

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: the output directory for generated yang tree.

parameter.name: line-length
parameter.description: integer,default is 72, a line max length.

parameter.name: expand-grouping
parameter.description: boolean,default is true,indicate whether expand grouping

plugin.name: yang_comparator
plugin.description: a plugin for comparing two yang schema.

parameter.name: compare-type
parameter.description: mandatory, specify compare-type, one of stmt,tree,or compatible-check

parameter.name: rule
parameter.description: optional, specify the path of compatible-rule file.

parameter.name: result
parameter.description: mandatory, specify the compare result file path, the result file is a xml format.
